state.name: geni_notready
state.description: Raw PCs and VMs begin powered down or inactive. They must be explicitly booted before use.

state.name: geni_configuring
state.description: Booting takes a significant amount of time, so it happens asynchronously while the node is in this state.

state.name: geni_ready

action.name: geni_stop
action.description: Power down or stop the node.

state.description: The node is up and ready to use.

state.name: geni_stopping
state.description: The node is being stopped or rebooted.

state.name: geni_failed
state.description: The node has failed and requires administrator intervention before it can be used. Please contact the administrator for assistance.

state.name: geni_updating_users
state.description: Updating users can take a fair amount of time, so it happens asynchronously in this state.
